attributes.action: Switch Road Tax to Fuel Duty
attributes.additional_details:
Add (say, 10p per litre) to fuel duty in lieu of a Tax Disc.
This would :
a) Tax on USAGE & POLLUTION
    The more you drive / the lower the MPG = More You      Pay - PAY AS YOU POLLUTE
b) ALL vehicles pay including FOREIGN PLATES
c) Very Difficult to avoid - forecourt drive-offs are breaking other laws as well
d) Easy to Implement -
  VED -> Levy on fuel from Jan 2015 -
  Make VED / 12 x mths left eg Apr-Dec 2014 = 9/12    x £year = Due to Dec 2013
  Easy &NO REFUND

You Know It Makes Sense...
